thread.title: Leonard Fournette shows leadership by comforting Nick Brossette, who fumbled the ball
thread.title_full: Leonard Fournette shows leadership by comforting Nick Brossette, who fumbled the ball | NOLA.com

author: Julie Boudwin, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Leonard Fournette shows leadership by comforting Nick Brossette, who fumbled the ball
text:
With 8:33 remaining in the LSU-South Carolina game, freshman running back Nick Brossette fumbled the ball, but the Tigers recovered.
ESPN cameras caught Brossette visibly upset with himself for the mistake. LSU's Heisman Trophy hopeful, Leonard Fournette, walked over to Brossette and comforted the younger back.
Fournette kneeled down and spoke to Brossette then walked away. When he realized Brossette was stilling hanging his head on the bench, Fournette walked back to Brossette and made him get up and join the team standing on the sideline.
Watch the videos below:
Leonard Fournette on the sideline comforting freshman RB Nick Brossette, who fumbled the ball. #leadership #LSU pic.twitter.com/3wImxIGqYg
— Julie Boudwin (@Julie_Boudwin) October 10, 2015 LSU's Leonard Fournette showing real leadership here. Comforting freshman Nick Brossette, who fumbled ball. https://t.co/Iu1K5oacYt
— Julie Boudwin (@Julie_Boudwin) October 10, 2015
